title: Mimir.Strength.trial2
body:
Well, let’s see... 
Ah! There! 
See that fallen tree there? 
I want you to go over there and lift it over your head. 
Only someone bestowed with the will and fortitude to overcome such arbitrary obstacles...
...is worthy of carrying the head of a god.

[[Monrjiall.Strength.myKind]]

title: Monrjiall.Strength.myKind
body:
Now THIS is my kind of test. 
I will lift that tree so high it will become a new star in the sky.

[[Mimir.Strength.specialKind]]

title: Mimir.Strength.specialKind
body:
Be careful, that is a very special kind of tree. 
It’s wood is heavier than any other and harder than most axes can pierce.

[[Monrjiall.Strength.convinced]]

title: Monrjiall.Strength.convinced
body:
I already said I’d do it! 
Stop trying to convince me!

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Strength.fallenTree
body:
You have to lift that fallen tree over your head.

[[Monrjiall.Strength.solid]]

title: Monrjiall.Strength.solid
body:
You mean that solid fallen tree over there?

[[Mimir.Strength.heavyLooking]]

title: Mimir.Strength.heavyLooking
body:
Yes, that solid, heavy looking fallen tree over there.

[[Monrjiall.Strength.thick]]

title: Monrjiall.Strength.thick
body:
Good, I’ll go lift that solid, heavy looking... 
...impossibly thick log of a fallen tree over there.

[[Mimir.Strength.goDoThat]]
